definition: Mogadishu, Indian ocean seaport and capital of Somalia
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: They flew into Mogadishu in Black Hawk helicopters in broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 他们在大白天乘坐黑鹰直升机飞入了摩加迪沙。

sentences.english: Mogadishu tosses lamb meat to the sharks.
sentences.chinese: 摩加迪沙正将小羊肉扔给鲨鱼。

sentences.english: Hundreds of Al-Shabaab fighters paraded through the streets of Mogadishu.
sentences.chinese: 数以百计的青年党战士在摩加迪沙的各个街道行进。

sentences.english: Some of the heaviest fighting was in the main Bakara market in south Mogadishu.
sentences.chinese: 最严重的冲突发生在摩加迪沙南部主要的巴克拉市场。

sentences.english: The mild stimulant makes the hardships of life in Mogadishu feel more bearable.
sentences.chinese: 这种淡味的刺激物使得摩加迪沙生活的艰难略为好过。

sentences.english: The battle of Mogadishu haunted me.
sentences.chinese: 摩加迪沙战役一直萦绕在我的心头。

definition: variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
Tripoli, capital of Libya/Tripoli, city in north Lebanon
Boko Haram, Islamic insurgent group in north Nigeria
